title: Setting up the cartridge
description: You don't know how to install and configure the cartridge?  Don't worry, you've come to the right place!

cartridge-installation.title: Cartridge installation
cartridge-installation.description: Ready to start? Ok... but how to download and install the cartridge?

cartridge-configuration.title: Configure the cartridge
